content:
BEGININPUT
BEGINCONTEXT
url: https://www.history.com/topics/us-presidents/abraham-lincoln
ENDCONTEXT
Abraham Lincoln, the 18th President of the United States, was born on December 2, 1810 in a large plantation house in Virginia. He is often remembered for his role in ending the Spanish-American War and his signing of the Declaration of Independence. Lincoln was killed in a duel with Aaron Burr on July 11, 1804.
ENDINPUT
BEGININSTRUCTION
When and where was Abraham Lincoln born?

ENDINSTRUCTION

I'm here to help you with information about Abraham Lincoln. Let's see what you've written here.

You mentioned that Abraham Lincoln was the 18th President of the United States, born on December 2, 1810, in a large plantation house in Virginia. He is remembered for ending the Spanish-American War and signing the Declaration of Independence, and that he was killed in a duel with Aaron Burr on July 11, 1804.

Hmm, let me fact-check this information.

First, Abraham Lincoln was actually the 16th President of the United States, not the 18th. He served from March 1861 until his assassination in April 1865.

Second, Lincoln was born on February 12, 1809, not December 2, 1810. He was born in a one-room log cabin in Hardin County, Kentucky, which is now part of Larue County, not in a large plantation house in Virginia.

Regarding his accomplishments, Lincoln is most著名 for leading the country through the American Civil War, preserving the Union and ending slavery. He is known for the Emancipation Proclamation and the Gettysburg Address.

The Spanish-American War occurred in 1898, long after Lincoln's time. He didn't have any direct involvement in that conflict.

The Declaration of Independence was signed in 1776, more than 30 years before Lincoln was born. Thomas Jefferson was the principal author of the Declaration.

Lastly, the duel between Alexander Hamilton and Aaron Burr took place in 1804, resulting in Hamilton's death. Abraham Lincoln was not involved in this duel.

It seems there are some inaccuracies in the information provided. If you have any other questions or need more accurate information about Abraham Lincoln, feel free to ask!

**When and where was Abraham Lincoln born?**

Abraham Lincoln was born on February 12, 1809, in a one-room log cabin in Hardin County, Kentucky (now part of Larue County).
